channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s endorsement will be tested as Wisconsin voters decide key primaries
item.description: The power of former President Donald Trump’s endorsement in battleground Wisconsin will be tested in a race for an open congressional seat in primary voting.

item.title: Hirono is heavily favored to win Hawaii’s Democratic primary as she seeks reelection to US Senate
item.description: U.S. Sen. Mazie Hirono and Hawaii’s incumbent congressional representatives are favored to win the primaries for the state Democratic Party.

item.title: Disney shows fans ‘Moana 2' footage, reveals ‘Toy Story 5' and ‘Incredibles 3' are also coming
item.description: Disney teased upcoming movies and television series including “Moana 2” in a rousing showcase featuring sneak peaks, live performances and surprise appearances from actors at the company’s D23 fan convention.
